data.content:
adverb
formal :by, of, or in itself - used to indicate that something is being considered by itself and not along with other things
She feels that there is nothing wrong with gambling per se, but she thinks that it should be done in moderation.

(tiếng La tinh)
tự nó; bản thân nó
the drug is not harmful per se, but is dangerous when taken with alcohol
thuốc ấy bản thân nó thì không có hại, nhưng uống với rượu thì lại nguy hiểm
